H0.text: In which US state was the American Declaration of Independence signed on 4th July 1776. US-MA

H1.text: In which US state was the American Declaration of Independence signed on 4th July 1776. US-VA

H2.text: In which US state was the American Declaration of Independence signed on 4th July 1776. US-NC

H3.text: In which US state was the American Declaration of Independence signed on 4th July 1776. US-PA

A4.text: The Declaration of Independence was adopted on July 4, 1776, in Independence Hall in Philadelphia.
